Question: In the Falklands, this person Day has been marked every 10 January since 1992, commemorating her visit in 1983.
Hints: Some Heathite Conservatives in the Cabinet, the so-called "wets", expressed doubt over this person's policies.
This person was the subject or the inspiration for 1980s protest songs.
During her premiership this person had the second-lowest average approval rating, at 40 percent, of any post-war Prime Minister.
